{% set current_fiscal_year = frappe.db.get_value("Global Defaults","Global Defaults","current_fiscal_year") %} {% set year_details = frappe.db.get_value("Fiscal Year", current_fiscal_year, ["year_start_date", "year_end_date"]) %} {% set gl_entries = frappe.get_all("GL Entry", filters={"docstatus":("<",2), "party_type":"Customer", "party":doc.name, "posting_date":("between",(year_details[0], year_details[1]))}, fields=["name", "posting_date", "account", "party_type", "party", "voucher_type", "voucher_no", "against_voucher_type", "against_voucher", "account_currency", "sum(debit_in_account_currency) as debit", "sum(credit_in_account_currency) as credit"], group_by="voucher_type, voucher_no, against_voucher_type, against_voucher, party", order_by="posting_date, name") %} {% set opening_balance = frappe.get_all("GL Entry", filters={"docstatus":("<",2), "party_type":"Customer", "party":doc.name, "posting_date":("<",year_details[0] ) }, fields=["name", "sum(debit_in_account_currency) as debit", "sum(credit_in_account_currency) as credit"]) %} {% set total_balance = frappe.get_all("GL Entry", filters={"docstatus":("<",2), "party_type":"Customer", "party":doc.name}, fields=["sum(debit_in_account_currency) as debit", "sum(credit_in_account_currency) as credit"]) %} {% for g in gl_entries %} {% if g.voucher_type == "Sales Invoice" %} {% set si_details = frappe.db.get_value("Sales Invoice", g.voucher_no, ["status", "outstanding_amount"]) %} {% if si_details[0] != "Paid" %} {% if g.voucher_no == g.against_voucher %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% if g.voucher_type == "Payment Entry" %} {% if not g.against_voucher %} {% set paid_amount = frappe.db.get_value("Payment Entry", g.voucher_no,"paid_amount") %} {% endif %} {% endif %} {% if g.voucher_type == "Journal Entry" %} {% set paid_amount = frappe.db.get_value("Journal Entry", g.voucher_no, "total_credit") %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
